topic.title: How use the "optinalfiles"-Feature?
topic.body: Can anybody explain or have an howto to use this feature step by step? Thanks!

topic.title: Searching for ZeroNet compatible HTML5-Videoplayer with playlist-shuffle support (without shown the playlist)
topic.body:
What is the best free and user friendiness? Any ideas?

I am expecting to use is like a ondemand "livestream" for videos or movies.

topic.title: ZeroMailProxy on Lubuntu 16.04
topic.body:
Have anyone experience with that?

On [Github](https://github.com/imachug/ZeroMailProxy) I cloned the archive. I use Â¸```pip install -r requirements.txt --upgrade``` in a virtualenv. All works fine. Than the error:

~~~shell
$ python start_server.py 
Exception in thread Thread-1:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801, in __bootstrap_inner
    self.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 754, in run
    self.__target(*self.__args, **self.__kwargs)
  File "/media/user/data/ZeroBundle/ZeroMailProxy/pop3/server.py", line 19, in serve
    self.sock.bind((self.host, self.port))
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 228, in meth
    return getattr(self._sock,name)(*args)
error: [Errno 13] Permission denied
Exception in thread Thread-2:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 801, in __bootstrap_inner
    self.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.py", line 754, in run
    self.__target(*self.__args, **self.__kwargs)
  File "/media/user/data/ZeroBundle/ZeroMailProxy/smtp/server.py", line 19, in serve
    self.sock.bind((self.host, self.port))
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/socket.py", line 228, in meth
    return getattr(self._sock,name)(*args)
error: [Errno 13] Permission denied
~~~
Path_env: /media/user/data/ZeroBundle/zeronet_env/
Path_Zeronet: /media/user/data/ZeroBundle/ZeroNet/
Path_ZeroMailProxy: /media/user/data/ZeroBundle/ZeroMailProxy/

What should i install to overcome the permission-problem?

1523985689_1A3HXsg9nYdffV3gBNDN5NDpdZE1x.body:
> [snowdash](#comment_1_1PctriJ155UjQV4HrXw9qr7rznf8MNBkaj): http://127.0.0.1:43110/TechNoob.bit/?Post:6Hope this will help you.

It is Chinese, but i think Google Translate will do the job. It is a simple howto. I think there should be a English How-to for this.

Thanks!

> [krixano](#comment_400_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): Do you mean from a developer perspective or from a user's perspective? For users, you're already using it if you've for example clicked on Show Image in ZeroMe, or viewed a video on KopyKate or downloaded files on ZeroUp, etc.

I mean how i can implement it in my blog or site. A simple way. snowdash had sent me a good enough tutorial in Chinese. Is there a English one?

1524231753_1F9qtxgSgbkeJX7NT2BARwR8XCn1X.body: LOL you are a crazy guy... ;-)

1525120165_1A3HXsg9nYdffV3gBNDN5NDpdZE1x.body:
> [deepstrelok](#comment_2_173pXRMqj6vLLVMV92FuyxAJWmcD5mnQGh): Grant privilegies to this user or use as root.

Thanks, but how can i do this in the save-way? I don't want to run the script as root.
Okay i think i have to search for python-modules for threading.py and socket.py to install via pip.
Okay as root it works now. Any idea how this works as user without changing the permissions of the files socket.py and threading.py ? pip packages are not available.

1566570350_1Dssbq2y2JDD14aojGG9RX3d5EPpw.body: Socialism and communism is the biggest cancer.

*How to cure the socialism infection:*

Tell your child to clean up the bathroom for $10.

Give him $10 after the work is done and take $7 back.

Give the 7 dollars to his siblings, who did nothing.

Repeat it until the disease is cured.

> [u9bvz8g9h99buz8v](#comment_1_1DHCkpc8NpexFPwsdsp58qXz321ZDXPqHe): Capitalism is the biggest cancer.

Not capitalism itself, but capitalism polluted by planned economy and government is a cancer.

> [aspidochelone](#comment_131_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsKABo1Z): How to cure the capitalism infectionGive one of your kids play rights to the entire house.  Also he gets all the food, and all the Christmas presents, and controls the TVs.  Tell his brothers and sisters they should see if there's anything they can do for him and maybe he'll let them have that broccoli he keeps tossing out in the trash.  Wait until his broken corpse is found at the bottom of the fire escape, and welcome your glorious proletarian offspring to the family!

I guess capitalism makes you think of monopoly. But monopolism does not exist in capitalism, monopolies are formed only by state violence and lobbyism. If the state did not interfere, subsidize and benefit itself, it would not exist. The banking system today is also anti-capitalist. It is slavery.
The thing is, all ideology, religion and similar systems are belief systems consisting of solid sectarian dogmas. Just because one is more represented than the other does not make it more correct.
